name.en: Freshman English as an Introduction to Engineering

goal.en: 新制大一英文課程目標 CEFR B2 15 Descriptors Listening 1. I can understand the main ideas of what is said to me in standard spoken English. 2. I can understand the main ideas of most audios and videos of familiar topics. 3. I can follow a lecture or talk within my own field if the presentation is clear. SPEAKING - Spoken Production 4. I can give a clear, prepared presentation about topics I am interested in and provide detailed descriptions. 5. I can express my opinion on an issue by giving reasons, talking about the advantages and disadvantages, or analyzing cause and effect. SPEAKING - Spoken Interaction 6. I can interact quite fluently and naturally in conversations. 7. I can, with some effort, keep up with and contribute to group discussions. READING 8. I can scan quickly through long and complex texts and find the details I want. 9. I can search and browse various sources to obtain relevant information. 10. I can understand the main ideas of reading materials within my field of study or of my interest. 11. I can understand the writer’s point of view when reading an article. WRITING 12. I can write an essay with reasonably accurate spelling and punctuation. 13. I can write an essay with clear descriptions and proper details. 14. I can write an essay combining the ideas from multiple sources. 15. I can write an essay giving reasons to support my point of view.
goal.ch: 新制大一英文課程目標 CEFR B2 15 Descriptors Listening 聽力 1.能聽懂用標準口語所說的內容大意。 2.能在主題熟悉的情況下，了解大部分音檔和影片的重點。 3.能在講者陳述清晰的情況下，了解個人專業領域內的課程或演講。 SPEAKING - Spoken Production 口語發表 4.能在事先準備的情況下，就感興趣的主題進行發表，並詳盡描述內容。 5.能透過提出論點、利弊、或因果關係等方法，來表達對一個議題的看法。 SPEAKING - Spoken Interaction 口語互動 6.能以一定的流暢度、自然地進行口語互動。 7.能在努力投入的情況下，跟上並參與小組討論。 READING 閱讀 8.能快速瀏覽長篇複雜文本並掌握所需的細節。 9.能搜尋和瀏覽多個資料出處以獲取相關資訊。 10.能理解個人專業領域或感興趣主題的文本大意。 11.能了解文章作者的觀點。 WRITING寫作 12.能寫出拼字和標點符號用法正確的文章。 13.能寫出描述清楚、提供細節的文章。 14.能寫出結合多個來源想法的文章。 15.能寫出清楚的理由來支持自己的論點。
